meta.title: LA GATTA | LAYOUT
meta.description: Spacious design and elegantly designed guest cabins.
meta.keywords: LA GATTA, Layout, Cabins, Spacious Design

spacious_design.title: SPACIOUS DESIGN
spacious_design.body: Lagoon’s ambition was to equip the SEVENTY 7 with the DNA of a superyacht in a design that visually shows the quest for excellence. This idea was prime in designing all the areas of the boat so that each line is integrated into the whole without dissonance. From the flybridge to the skirts and from the bow towards the stern; spaces are plentiful and all are connected simultaneously.

cabins.title: CABINS
cabins.body: LA GATTA features four elegantly designed guest cabins. Each of these are fitted with an island bed, ample storage, and private bathroom. The spacious master suite features a hydraulic platform which opens to create a private “beach” giving direct sea access and a special spot to sunbathe. The crew quarters and galley are configured as to facilitate the staff’s work on board. Two bunks in the forepeak allow for two additional guests. The LYNX bed can be configured as a queen or two twins.

cabin_amenities.title: CABIN AMENITIES
specs: Opening hatches and portholes if you prefer the natural sea breeze
500 thread count Egyptian luxury cotton sheets
Pillow Menu – Down & feather in both soft and medium as well as Tempur-Pedic®
GioBaganara Collection luxury leather valet accessories
Aesop toiletries & coral reef safe, biodegradable sunblock
Heated towel rails in all bathrooms
Integrated lay-flat charging pads beside all beds
120 volt international power sockets with integrated USB plug
Cabins fully serviced daily, including nightly turn down service

main_deck.title: MAIN DECK
main_deck.body: The main bridge is defined with a living space of 80 m² where the outside and inside are merged. The salon is filled with light and has panoramic views. It extends to the aft and forward cockpit with several living spaces. From back to front, all spaces become one. The front deck has a lounge space with two sofas and two large trampolines for sunbathing.

images.body: Day bed and dining table facing each other.

living_space.title: THE FLYBRIDGE
living_space.body: The spacious flybridge gives impressive additional space. Its breathtaking viewpoint is ideal for eating and relaxing during sea trips. LA GATTA is the only SEVENTY 7 with a Jacuzzi. The flybridge is also outfitted with a mounted projector and a high tech dual image screen that can be seen from both sides.

images.body: The only SEVENTY 7 with a Jacuzzi on the flybridge.
images.title: JACUZZI

images.body: The space is divided into two: navigation at the front and relaxation areas at the back.
images.title: FLYBRIDGE

images.body: The two helm stations allow an optimal view during maneuvering.
images.title: FLYBRIDGE

images.body: Plancha cabinet with ample storage and bar cabinet with sink, fridge and ice-maker.
images.title: FLYBRIDGE LIVING SPACE
